You can<!-- --> <a href="https://tally.so/create" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">get started right away</a> <!-- -->and create forms using advanced features like<!-- --> <a href="https://tally.so/help/conditional-form-logic" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">conditional logic</a>,<!-- --> <a href="https://tally.so/help/electronic-signatures" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">signatures</a>,<!-- --> <a href="https://tally.so/help/form-calculator" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">calculations</a>,<!-- --> <a href="https://tally.so/help/file-uploads" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">file uploads</a>, and many more  all for free and without time restrictions.</div></div><div data-sentry-element="Item" data-sentry-source-file="index.tsx" class="sc-612f8818-3 kVXfIq"><div data-sentry-element="ItemTitle" data-sentry-source-file="index.tsx" class="sc-612f8818-1 bOiwkq"><div>Are Tally forms secure?</div><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-chevron-right closed" aria-hidden="true" data-sentry-element="ChevronRight" data-sentry-source-file="index.tsx"><path d="m9 18 6-6-6-6"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-chevron-down opened" aria-hidden="true" data-sentry-element="ChevronDown" data-sentry-source-file="index.tsx"><path d="m6 9 6 6 6-6"></path></svg></div><div data-sentry-element="ItemContent" data-sentry-source-file="index.tsx" class="sc-612f8818-2 bxPIsK">Yes, Tally takes security seriously. As a Belgium-based (EU) company, we fully comply with<!-- --> <a href="https://tally.so/help/gdpr" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">GDPR requirements</a> <!-- -->and store all form data in Europe. Your data is encrypted both in transit and at rest, and we provide you complete control over the information you collect. Our intuitive interface and powerful features like conditional logic, signatures, and password protection are available without paywalls.
